    Model classes for curation/correction related components
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.project
    Support for project definition such as checking appropriate project name, if a user is a project admin and so on
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.util
    Utility classes for brat annotation/curation/correction
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.webapp.dao
    Provides Implementations of the RepositoryService and AnnotationService Interfaces
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.webapp.page.monitoring
    Provides Monitoring functionalities to WebAnno
